ecd_onboarding_description_1: Your information is vital, so it is important to prioritise both security and performance.
ecd_onboarding_description_2: With Enterprise Cloud Databases, you can focus on your applications rather than the technical aspects of your databases. Our solution is based on dedicated hardware infrastructures, offering both outstanding performance and high availability. It only takes a few minutes to migrate smoothly to the cloud, and mount your managed databases.
ecd_onboarding_guide1_description: Explore the architecture behind the managed PostgreSQL solution
ecd_onboarding_guide2_title: Getting started with your PostgreSQL cluster
ecd_onboarding_guide2_description: Find out how to order, secure and connect to your PostgreSQL instance
ecd_onboarding_guide3_description: Enterprise Cloud Databases solution EOL details
